name: CandyVision of the Unknown
description:
A game made for Game Jam Plus 2019.

Candy is an intergalactic scientist who visits unknown planets to understand how her biome works.
Help Candy through this first phase to survive to begin her knowledge adventure.
CandyVision is a game with just one "button", with which you move Candy through the stage. Move the runes to jump, lower and walk (don't forget to hold the rune forward to walk), make combinations of movements to be able to dash, roll and jump with dash.
